meanings.sent1: The noncoverage of dental care left many people without proper treatment.
meanings.sent2: The insurance policy had a clause about noncoverage of pre-existing conditions.
meanings.sent3: The noncoverage of the event was like forgetting to invite the main guest to a party.
meanings.sent4: Her noncoverage of the topic was a glaring gap in her research paper.
meanings.sent5: The noncoverage of the news story made it difficult for the public to stay informed.

meanings.sent1: The noncoverage of certain medications surprised the patient.
meanings.sent2: The noncoverage of elective procedures was clearly stated in the policy.
meanings.sent3: His noncoverage of the team meeting was like missing a crucial match in a tournament.
meanings.sent4: The noncoverage of the VIP section made the event feel less exclusive.
meanings.sent5: The noncoverage of the special discount left many customers disappointed.

meanings.sent1: The noncoverage of the emergency service was a serious issue.
meanings.sent2: The noncoverage of the warranty led to unexpected repair costs.
meanings.sent3: Their noncoverage of the project deadline was like missing the last train home.
meanings.sent4: The noncoverage of the safety protocol resulted in an accident.
meanings.sent5: The noncoverage of the insurance claim left the family in a difficult situation.
